Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3821 affecting package systemd-bootstrap for versions less than 250.3-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3821 affecting package systemd-bootstrap for versions less than 250.3-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package systemd-bootstrap is earlier than 250.3-17, affected by CVE-2022-3821
